name: Patchwork Kingdom #18 | Hunqasar
description: The twin kingdoms of Hunqasar, separated by a digital divide. A bustling kingdom of 134 schools on top that are all connected to the internet, and 111 schools, not connected, hidden in the upside down kingdom | Created for Giga (GigaConnect.org) — connecting every school in the world — in celebration of UNICEF's 75th birthday, by Nadieh Bremer
